You're Doing Work You Shouldn't Be Doing

Most founders spend 60% of their time on tasks that don't move the needle. Here's what's actually eating your days:

The Research Black Hole

Drowning in Information

You're supposed to make strategic decisions, but you're stuck reading 47-page market reports, hunting through competitor pricing, and manually tracking industry news. By the time you've finished researching, the opportunity's gone.

The Sales Time Sink

Sales Outreach That Never Ends

You know you should be prospecting, but crafting 50 personalized emails takes 4 hours you don't have. So you push it off. And your pipeline dries up. Again.

The Support Trap

Tickets That Multiply Overnight

Every morning starts with 30+ support requests. Password resets, feature questions, refund requests. You're paying yourself founder salary to do $15/hour work.

Meet Your AI Workforce

Pink Beam isn't another AI tool you have to learn. It's a team of autonomous AI employees that scale your output without scaling your headcount. They handle the repetitive work so your human team can focus on what they do best—strategy, creativity, and relationships.

Hire your first AI employee today:

Sarah

Market Intelligence Analyst

Monitors competitors, tracks industry trends, and delivers weekly briefs with actionable insights. She reads 500+ sources so you don't have to.

Mike

Sales Development Representative

Identifies prospects, crafts personalized outreach, and books meetings on your calendar. He sends 200 tailored emails a day—and follows up perfectly every time.

Alex

Customer Support Specialist

Handles tier-1 support tickets, answers FAQs, and escalates only what needs human judgment. He responds in under 2 minutes, 24/7.

Casey

Content Marketing Specialist

Writes blog posts, social content, email sequences, and ad copy in your brand voice. She publishes consistently—without the content calendar headaches.

LUMEN

Visual Designer

Creates social graphics, presentation decks, ad creatives, and brand assets. She works in your brand guidelines and delivers print-ready files.

FLUX

Motion Designer

Produces short-form video content, animated explainers, and social clips. She edits, adds captions, and optimizes for every platform—automatically.

From Signup to Employee in 10 Minutes

Simple setup. Powerful results. No technical expertise required.

01

Hire in Minutes, Not Months

Pick your employee type, connect your tools, and spend 5 minutes training them on your brand voice and priorities. No resumes. No interviews. No onboarding headaches.

02

They Start Immediately

Your AI employee begins working the moment you finish setup. They monitor, research, reach out, respond, create, and optimize—around the clock. While you sleep, they're working.

03

You Stay in Control

Every Monday, get a weekly brief with what your employees accomplished. Review qualified leads, resolved tickets, published content, and completed projects. Adjust priorities anytime.

What Each Employee Can Do

Every AI employee comes fully trained and ready to deliver specific, measurable outcomes from day one.

Sarah

Market Intelligence Analyst

Fully autonomous team member with built-in capabilities and continuous learning.

Key Capabilities

  • Competitive Monitoring: Track competitor pricing, product launches, and messaging changes in real-time
  • Market Intelligence: Synthesize industry reports, news, and trends into weekly executive briefs
  • Prospect Research: Deep-dive on target accounts and decision-makers before your sales calls
  • Regulatory Tracking: Monitor policy changes and compliance requirements affecting your industry
  • Custom Reports: Answer specific research questions with sourced, cited findings

Who Is Pink Beam For?

Whether you're a solo founder or leading a team, our AI employees adapt to your needs and deliver results.

By Industry

Move Faster with Less Burn

Launch, iterate, and scale without hiring a 20-person team. One AI employee costs less than a single contractor—and works 10x faster.

Deliver More Without Hiring More

Handle 3x the client load without expanding headcount. Your AI team drafts, designs, and researches—your humans just review and refine.

Automate the Work That Slips Through Cracks

Supplement your existing team with AI employees that handle overflow, after-hours coverage, and repetitive tasks humans shouldn't touch.

By Role

Get Your Time Back

Stop doing $15/hour work. Your AI employees handle research, outreach, and support so you can focus on product, strategy, and fundraising.

Build Pipeline on Autopilot

Your AI SDR works 24/7 identifying prospects, personalizing outreach, and booking meetings. Your human closers just show up and sell.

Scale Without the Headcount Chaos

Add capacity instantly without the recruiting, onboarding, and management overhead. Scale up during busy seasons. Scale down when you need to.

Publish Consistently, Finally

Your AI content team produces weekly blogs, daily social posts, and ongoing email campaigns—without the freelancer hunt or agency fees.
